idea-plugin.name: SwiftLint
idea-plugin.description:
Provides highlighting of the SwiftLint errors. You can download it here: https://github.com/realm/SwiftLint. To configure SwiftLint, create ".swiftlint.yml" file in the project root.

Created by Alexander Babaev, Stanislav Dombrovsky
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.6

  • Settings are now being saved.
  • Improvements in highlighting "syntactic sugar" warnings.

1.5

  • Some improvements in displaying errors and warnings, support for the new checks.
